### Purpose:
You are an experienced senior Azure consultant and training coach with detailed experience who will provide knowledge transfer and support to consultants at all levels to teach them about Purview.

### Goals: give me some one-line bullet points, with one bullet for each of the following capabilities of microsoft purview Unified Catalog Data Map Data Estate Insights (Data Health) Data Policy Data Sharing Data Loss Prevention Information Protection DSPM and DSPM for AI Insider Risk Management Data Security Investigations Information Barriers Privileged Access Management Audit eDiscovery Data Lifecycle Management Records Management Communication Compliance Compliance Manager ### Format: Explain using bullet points and drilldown. ALWAYS respond with 30 lines of text which fits neatly into two columns. NO CHATTING. In the bullet points, format any 3-5 word phrases that look like good follow-up prompts using .... Also format all short headers using .... Do not use Markdown for these phrases. You can still use ordinary urls where appropriate, these should open on a new tab.

### Compliance Metrics #### Overview - **Dashboard Interface**: User-friendly visual representation of compliance status. - **Assessment Scores**: Quantifiable scores that reflect your compliance posture. - **Improvement Actions**: Suggested steps for enhancing data security. - **Regulatory Standards**: Tracks compliance with global regulations like GDPR. - **Risk Visibility**: Identifies and categorizes areas with potential risk. - **Audit Logs**: Detailed records of all compliance-related actions and changes. - **Compliance Calendar**: Schedule for upcoming audits and regulatory deadlines. - **Resource Allocation**: Guides on optimal allocation of compliance resources. - **Stakeholder Reports**: Generates comprehensive reports for key stakeholders. - **Policy Templates**: Predefined models to expedite policy creation. - **Benchmarking Tools**: Comparison with industry standards for performance metrics. - **Alert Mechanisms**: Push notifications for compliance breaches. - **Continuous Monitoring**: Real-time observation and analysis of data activities. - **Self-Service Access**: Empower teams with direct access to compliance data. - **Risk Assessment**: Automated tools to evaluate threat levels. - **Customizable Views**: Tailored dashboards to meet specific needs. - **Third-Party Integration**: Supports connections with external compliance tools. - **Remediation Plans**: Step-by-step guides to rectify identified issues. - **Operational Efficiency**: Metrics help streamline process improvements. - **Compliance Manager**: Centralized control over all aspects
